title: Dune Part II
description: Dune: Part II (2023), directed by Denis Villeneuve, follows Paul Atreides as he allies with the Fremen to avenge his family and fulfill his destiny, facing powerful enemies and epic battles on the desert planet Arrakis.

title: Inception
description: Inception (2010), directed by Christopher Nolan, follows Dom Cobb, a thief who steals secrets from within dreams. To clear his record, he must plant an idea in a target's mind. Cobb assembles a team to navigate the complex dream layers.
